package.name: Ralab_Guest
package.summary: Adds the ability convert guest users into registered customers.
package.description:
Auto Register Guest User is the free and easy to use solution for Magento which enables merchants to automatically register a guest user.

Features at a glance:

  • Ability to automatically convert guest users into registered users.
  • This extension auto-generates password for the new guest users and sends welcome email to these users
  • Supports Paypal Express Checkout
  • Developer Friendly

If you have any questions or feedback, please let me know on kalpeshbalar@gmail.com
package.notes:
Ability to automatically convert guest users into registered users.
Added feature to auto-generates password for the new guest users and sends welcome email to these users.
